# Roadmap

AgenticCoder development roadmap and future plans.

---

## ğŸ¯ Vision

AgenticCoder aims to become the most intelligent, comprehensive multi-agent system for generating production-ready applications across all modern technology stacks.

## âœ… Current Release (v2.0.0)

**Released**: January 2026  
**Status**: Stable, Production Ready

### Capabilities

| Feature | Status |
|---------|--------|
| 26 specialized agents | âœ… Complete |
| 16-phase orchestration | âœ… Complete |

| Self-learning error system | âœ… Complete |
| Real-time monitoring dashboard | âœ… Complete |
| Feedback loop system | âœ… Complete |
| Validation framework | âœ… Complete |
| Execution bridge | âœ… Complete |

### Technology Support

| Layer | Supported |
|-------|-----------|
| **Frontend** | React, Vue, Angular, Svelte |
| **Backend** | Node.js, .NET, Python, Go, Java |
| **Database** | PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB |
| **Cloud** | Azure (primary) |
| **IaC** | Bicep (Azure Verified Modules) |
| **CI/CD** | GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps |

- âœ… 70+ unit tests
- âœ… 17 scenario tests (S01-S17)
- âœ… Integration tests for all components

## ğŸ”œ Q1 2026 (v2.1.0)

**Timeline**: February - March 2026  
**Theme**: Local AI Assistant & Framework Enhancements

### ğŸ³ Local AI Assistant (Docker Container)

A standalone alternative to VS Code - run AgenticCoder anywhere!

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Docker Container** | Self-contained, no external dependencies |
| **Web Chat Interface** | Real-time WebSocket chat with syntax highlighting |
| **Local LLM Support** | Ollama integration for privacy |
| **GitHub Integration** | Read agents/skills from any repo |
| **RAG Search** | Vector database for intelligent context |

**Benefits:**
- âœ… No VS Code required
- âœ… Works in any browser (mobile/desktop)
- âœ… Runs 24/7 on your server
- âœ… Complete privacy (local processing)
- âœ… Can run offline

| **Next.js** | @nextjs-specialist (enhanced) | ğŸ“‹ Planned |
| **Nuxt** | @nuxt-specialist (enhanced) | ğŸ“‹ Planned |
